Html:
Anyone else having trouble with text-shadow? I've tried it every which way, and the shadow doesn't render in the PDF.

<fo:inline font-size="32pt" font-style="italic" color="#003300" text-shadow="#ff6666 10mm 10mm">
   Some Text
</fo:inline>

Am I doing something wrong?

Hi - since FO.NET was ported from FOP 0.20.4, I doubt that text-shadow was implemented at that time.

Mark
